SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: All three requirements focus on allowing users to customize their privacy settings regarding personal information and health data shared with caregivers.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Requirement P-001-FR-003 and P-003-FR-001 are similar in intent but differ slightly in wording. P-007-FR-002 adds the aspect of providing clear explanations in accessible language.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Customizable Privacy Settings with Clear Explanations
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide users with customizable privacy settings that enable them to control what personal information and health data are shared with caregivers and how it is utilized, with clear explanations provided in accessible language.

SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements emphasize the importance of transparency and compliance in data handling practices.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: P-003-FR-004 focuses on user transparency regarding data practices, while P-004-NFR-001 specifically addresses compliance with data privacy regulations.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Transparent Data Practices and Compliance
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall provide clear and accessible information regarding data practices, including how user data is collected, stored, and shared, while ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations to secure user data.

Conflicts.Note: P-004-NFR-001 emphasizes strict compliance with data privacy regulations which may require complicated security measures, whereas P-006-FR-003 focuses on a simple, secure communication channel that might not fully address all compliance needs.
